Blog.post: Never ever Thought of making a blog... In the end , unable to digest the ***(enthusiasm)and created a blog.2morrow is the day i have waited for so long=(Class gathering).Now thinking abouthwat time to go there tomorrow...Hope the best for tomorrow!!! I felt so confused... about my 5 friends...i treat them as my friends(4 good friends + 1 best friend)but i felt that they treat me like an outsider.At night i would sometimes keep thinking and thinking.In the end,Wo beng kui le and cry until i fell asleep...Dunno wat to do ??? Is anybody there who can help me??? No,i don think so ... only the 5 friends are able to help me... The helpless soul...

Haha!!! Camp was so fun,my spirit now is still like i am still at the camp but it needs alot of risk-taking.I was so scared,the adventures there was very high,'at least' 11 storeys.In the end,i completed all the challenges there ,actually i was afraid to go up the challenges but all the girls in my team want to go up so i also go out.i thought i would drop down and die i completed. Felt so happy for myself.I was so relieved now that i have tried because this kind of things is like once in a lifetime,u do not always have the chance to try u noe??? After the camp,i felt that i have learnt alot through the camp.Now,i know where are my goals and what i must do to achieve them.For example: 1st:Take more initiative to volunteer. 2nd:Trust all my friends wholeheartedly so that they will also put their trust in me. 3rd:Improve my friendship with all my friends to the fullest and work well with my friends. Hope all my friends can see my sincerity in improving myself especially *** and some others...
Jasmine...Fancy you saying that you all want to finish the project using only one day.I tell u thats definitely a lie...We won't be able to finish but u don belive me Haiz...
Haiz...,So much homework...,Haiz... So many things on mind... I am so confused... Hope I could watch "The day after tomorrow" and "Tu ran fa cai"...Haiz...No money... So ke lianz...
I am so frustrated after all the thinking and thinking and thinking... Today,iwoke up at 2.38pm...My cousin and i started to sing karaoke until 6.47pm... Wo zong yu fa xie chu lai le ... Hahaz...
Today,Haiz...,Need to decide alot of things... Jasmine___watch harry potter...Liying___Watch harry potter... Cousins___Watch harry potter...,etc... Cant decide who to go with...Haiz... So ke lianz...

I went to my CIP today... It was an "eventful" day...I meet with my friend,mason...but i was late so he went inside first...Then in the end,i need to do CIP until 1.25pm...We didn't meet with Yilin,our senior...I have my reason but Jasmine thought mason and I mei you liang xin... Haiz...,being wu hui by jas... Need to explain... I hope that for the rest of my day,i can have a more peaceful day...

Today,i went to alot of places---Toa Payoh,Ang Mo Kio,Orchard and Far East etc...We walked throughout the whole day... My legs were so suan...At 9.30pm,i went to tampines mall to watch a movie(Shrek 2) It was a tiring day...

Feeling so happy... Yesterday was a wonderful day including that jas did in the end go with me.I am so fortunate.yesterday was a fun day,except some bo liao people...Making a mess when others are playing... Yesterday i met my friends + 2 other ***...Jasmine was so happy playing with this 2***...i guess she won't regret going with me...Jasmine yesterday don't wish to go home...i oso but in the i did go home because the 2*** say go home together...Hahaz... Jas muz be very happy cause she had change her *** to (life seems much more meaningful...)I am so grateful to her ...(taught by jas... Her english real good ...

Today,as what i wrote during yesterday is my class gathering day but maybe i am not going because of a specified reason(One of my friends is not going. I wish i can go but she's not going.I felt so ***(unable to describe). Haiz...Anyone able to help me???Only *** is able to help me by going there...Feeling so sad...Waiting for her answer...So afraid of her answer...God,please let the answer be yes,hope she would be gan dong by my yi pian cheng xin...Waiting for your answer...jas!!! I am so Po Bu Ji Tai De Zai Deng Ni De answer Leh ...So disappointed...

I was so frustrated today that i cried...I have done alot of the racial harmony project given by miss abey but was asked to do another project and give this one up... Why?Why must she do that to me... Actually,I m not angry...I am just frustrated...So in the end, i refused to talk---even to my mother and father...She called,I also refused to talk until 9pm... I have not done any homework that needs to be pass up tomorrow and i still have to do the project... If "she" is to reply or comment, pls do it at the *** website... Once again,I am not angry, just frustrated...

The difference between great people and everyone else is that great people create their lives actively,while everyone else is created by their lives,passively waiting to see where takes them next.The differnce between the two is the difference between living fully and just existing. By Jia Qi
